snippet.title: Ott 'stole' Buffalo Sabres' bright new third jersey
snippet.description: in Buffalo's new third jersey and posted the photo to his Twitter feed. The Sabres' Twitter feed had been unveiling the jersey piecemeal; the hockey pants here, a swatch of fabric there, as fan intrigue mounted with each photo. By Wednesday the full reveal still seemed days away, but Ott had other ideas. Just as he breaks up opposing rushes, Ott broke up his own team's social media offensive...
